massim.framework

Class SimulationRun

  • java.lang.Object
    • massim.framework.SimulationRun
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ServerSimulationRun2

    public class SimulationRun
extends Object
    This class provides a very simple method to configure a simulation and to run it.
